price: ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ ߒ ߡߊ߬ ߘߍ߫ ، ߏ߬ ߞߍ ߸ ߊ߬ ߕߏ߫ ߘߊ߫ ( ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ) ߜߍ߬ߟߍ߲ ߣߌ߫ ( ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ) ߞߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߡߊߛߏ߬ߛߊ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسۡحَۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ruddūhā ʿalayya faṭafiqa masḥan bil-sūqi wal-aʿnāqi
